friendly_name: Local Mission Dossier Authority & Parity Export
source_description: Implement local Mission Dossier projection as the source authority for artifact completeness, full-text local views, and SaaS parity export. Add mission dossier projection in local runtime with typed artifact catalog entries, index and expose full-text artifact coverage, add local dashboard/API endpoints, emit canonical dossier/parity events to sync pipeline, surface explicit missing expected artifacts.
